enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of elements, making them suitable for setting up tests that involve class attribute manipulation.
Both methods involve class attribute manipulation, making them suitable for setting up tests that require toggling or adding classes.
The hasClass method can be used to verify that the class has been successfully added to the elements, making it a direct assertion method for addClass.
The attr method can be used to verify the class attribute directly, providing an alternative way to assert the result of addClass.
